effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the user’s fire type after damage calculation. If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.

flavor_text.sword_shield: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.
